body:
@raymak Could this be after having the tab that Normandy is in open for a while? I'm guessing that the auth0 session is expiring, and when making an API request the page is getting a redirected to auth0.

If you didn't get a CSP error you'd get a different kind of error since our client can't handle this right now, but at least we could provide a nicer error message.
